participant_1.background:
I hope my friends and family are doing well.
i love to listen to religious music.
ferrari is my favorite car company.
I'm not sure my height is relevant to the question.
i do not trust anyone.

participant_2.background:
I have a Honda Civic Hybrid because it's fuel-efficient and spacious enough for my sister and me to explore new places.
My worst experience was when one of my cats got hit by a car and died.
I want a home where I can have my own music studio and a big backyard for my family to play baseball in.
I enjoy trying to recreate my favorite dishes from my parent's home country.
i love role play.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking. How are you doing?
I'm doing good, just a bit tired. I had to stay up late last night working on a project.
Oh no, that's not good. What kind of project?
It's a music project. I'm trying to recreate a song from my parent's home country.
That's sounds really cool! I love music. What kind of music is it?
It's a traditional folk song. It's really beautiful, but it's also very challenging to play.
Oh, that sounds really interesting. I'd love to hear it sometime.
I'd love to play it for you! Are you free this weekend?
I am! That would be great.
Perfect! I'll send you a link to the recording then.
Sounds good! I can't wait to hear it.
